reviewText:
When you have chronic back pain this is the exercise program for you.
It starts slow and has very effective exercises for your back and does not hurt your back.
Received the item promptly.
The exercise is very effective to cure the back pain. I recommend this DVD to any person with back pain.

This video shows a 21 day exercise program for back pain. These exercises seem to help.  I've had no difficulty since I began the program. I find the exercises easy to fit into my daily schedule.  The video is dated, maybe from the"80's. It is kind of funny in a way, but the exercises are good!

Excellent excercises and activities for treating low back pain. I've recommended this tape for many years and had excellent feedback from those who've watched the video and followed the advice therein. Originally I got this tape to treat my own injured back, and have purchased many copies through the years to lend to others (I don't always get them back!) Both my general practitioner and neurologist expressed being "impressed" by the tape, and each ordered several copies to lend to patients - they each told me that all of their patients reported significant relief from pain after viewing and doing the exercises in the video. My advice to all: if any one exercise increases pain, skip it and go on to the next exercise. (By the way, I'm a registered nurse.) No More Back Pain
